replies.body: No more old cursor... how am I suppose to play D:
Damn this is literally game-breaking for me. New courser is absolute trash.

I felt the new icon was just something you put out to do something new, can't stand it, just a distraction when I tried to use it. Now you're forcing everyone onto it, sweet deal are you going to force all gameplay to locked camera next? I mean why have options it just takes up space.
Riot is really making me want to quit this game more and more. OUT OF ALL THE THINGS IN THE GAME, THEY CHOSE THE LEGACY CURSOR
the feature of having the option is absolutely harmless to the game, now I have to use some shitty new cursor I hated from the start, lovely!

That's what happens when people that never played this game in their life get to decide which user interface objects stay and which get removed.

Remeber the ping buttons? Wouldn't have come back even with the outcry that came, if not for a physically disabled player luckily being able to change Rito's mind and even then they didn't add both pings back but only one.
I've been using the old cursor for so long, I'm sad now {{sticker:sg-janna}}
Riot this is a SERIOUS ISSUE WE NEED OLD CURSOR
Yeah, like I don't understand why they need to remove that option tho? Whats the harm in it
Seems giga random to remove old cursor but okay I guess. Suppose thats more important then fixing the ghost plants everyone has to suffer through all the time.
ITS NOT JUST ME???
because fixing a bug that they likely have been working on is equal to removing a small feature that likely not many people used anymore and may have been causing more bugs  -_-

> [{quoted}](name=MangoInfinity1,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=0PGlEVl6,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2019-07-30T18:37:03.933+0000)
>
> because fixing a bug that they likely have been working on is equal to removing a small feature that likely not many people used anymore and may have been causing more bugs  -_-

Because it isn't equal.  It's more important to fix the plants.
Petition to keep old cursor
Sign me on it
Literally what’s the point in taking the legacy cursor away? I hate the new one

I never liked the newer cursor, I had a hard time keeping track of it during fights. Since I swapped back to the Legacy Cursor, this hasn't been an issue.

So the question I have here is why get rid of it now instead of doing it when the new cursor launched? Hell. why get rid of it at all?

Why the fuck do you guys just constantly delete features? Ever since the new client dropped it is STILL missing features the old client had. for what fucking purpose does the legacy cursor need to be removed? all you cause from it are the people that prefer it over the new one to get upset. literally nothing is gained from this stupid decision.

Riot: "Clarity of gameplay is super important to us"

Also Riot:  "We're going to repeatedly change and remove elements of UI that players have learned to use to play the game, like the cursor, to serve no purpose while refusing to make changes people actually asked for, not even sensible color adjustments for _paid_ skins, and making a flying robot limp around the battlefield because you might not get that it's a robot.
After all, clarity is so important to us."
Why the fuck did you get rid of the old cursor so many people still used it and the new one is terrible.
Please don't remove the gauntlet :(
I hate the new curser. #GiveMeBackMyPointeyFinger
I don't like this patch.
I honestly didnt mind it until the out of nowhere cursor removal

Riot responding to the community be like

Nope you're nitpicking and biased we win bye bye
LOL, somebody watched dunkey's new video! Hell yeah, comment of the day right here!
Please keep the old cursor in the game. :(
Sooo...still nothing about fixing the bug about the plants that appears to be "available" and actually it isn't?
what type of thought process goes through their heads when they removed the cursor, literally 0 reason
WHY ARE YOU REMOVING THE CURSOR? Like i hate using the new cursor so much, it looks so ugly and distracting pls god let me keep using the new cursor
Screw that lifeless triangle give me back my finger. I honestly hate the new one it's so boring and it's not like removing it does anything. #fingergang
Sooooooooooooooooooooo Qiyana Gets water from health packs in aram, what about twisted tree line?
Riot has long forgotten about Twisted Treeline.

What's that?

(But yeah, she should be able to use it on the altars and middle to get water)
does riot know their community hates them? s9 is such a joke

What are you talking about, i thoroughly enjoyed the first day of patch 9.14 where electrocute didnt proc, and manaflow band didnt proc, and glacial didnt proc, and three characters broke the game so hard they had to remove them.
{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

This patch especially the cursor removal is why I quit this game to play other games riot doesnt give a flying fuck about anything especially the players. When I say epic games gives more of a shit theres a problem
so why still comment and look at the patch notes?
Prolly under the hope Riot fixes problems instead of creating more
You know you've released a pointless patch when 99% of the comments are talking about how you removed the legacy cursor and not the actual champion changes

I expected nothing and was still disappointed. Make up your mind on what you want him to be please.
{{sticker:galio-happy}}
No reasons given for removing the old (better) cursor, completely out of the blue. Classic Riot.
Rip Legacy Cursor
why would youever remove the old cursor? this new one is garbage i cant ever play with it
No more legacy cursor? RIP I'm quitting league then. Wow classic is out next month anyway.
Patch 9.16: “We are now going to remove legacy music from the game because we can, your opinions don’t matter, you’re nitpicking, bye bye.”

Riot! I don't leave comments, but ever since the removal of DOMINION I've been sitting on the edge of my seat for you to treat TWISTED TREELINE the same way. Don't do it Riot. We can see the impending doom for Twisted. {{champion:246}} can't use river in TT but can in ARAM now. This is bullshit, stop killing off your old fanbase. Nostalgia has got to be the largest reason old players still play and now you're killing that. Slowly but surely. Fucking stop, please. Sincerely Coda.
So are we to just assume that Qiyana also gets River from the health pack in Twisted Treeline, or did y'all completely forget to give that map any consideration for balancing as usual?

I don't like the contents of this patch (been like this for months now), the new TFT patch brings nothing to people that get 9 gold in pve almost every game..

But the removal of the legacy cursor will be more than enough for me to not play this game at least til the next patch.
